com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.core
Class SingleShotListener

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.core.SingleShotListener

public class SingleShotListener
extends java.lang.Object

Taskomatic's Quartz scheduled job listener This listener counts down from a maximum number of jobs scheduled and then shuts down the SchedulerKernel.
